page.title: 04A walk through the grid III
page.content: At the roundabout we took the third turning towards Highcliffe. Too our right was Plessey's, a large communication and electronics firm. On our right was a few older style bungalows , a small green and a new housing estate called Hoburne. Ahead lay a new 200 yard section of dual carriageway and a large roundabout. Ahead towards the left was the old Christchurch airfield which is now a new housing estate. Nearly all the roads are named after famous aeronautical names. We turned left into Hoburne Road. There was a large Caravan Park to our right with houses beyond . To our left the new Housing estate had some more houses being built. The estate stopped suddenly and there was a large field with a few animals in it.
